item.title: NBA Draft Odds Plot
item.author: mdlee12@gmail.com (Michael Lee)
item.description: Original Source I was scrolling twitter and noticed this tweet from David Sparks - Director of Basketball Analytics for the Boston Celtics: With his obligatory shoutouts to Hadley Wickham and BoB Rudis, I felt compelled to reproduce the plot in RStudio and get some ggplot2 code out there open-sourcing his work. Package Dependencies and Data The data was generated using simulations of the NBA Draft lottery, which resulted in some peculiar distributions compared to the raw lottery odds.
